title: Chocolate Croissant
shortDescription: A flaky and buttery croissant filled with rich chocolate.

title: Blueberry Muffin
shortDescription: Soft and fluffy muffin with fresh blueberries.

title: Sourdough
shortDescription: Crusty on the outside with a tangy flavor from the sourdough starter.

title: Cinnamon Roll
shortDescription: Warm cinnamon rolls drizzled with sweet icing.

title: Apple Pie
shortDescription: A classic apple pie with a buttery flaky crust and spiced apples.

title: Pumpkin Bread
shortDescription: A moist bread with a hint of cinnamon and nutmeg, perfect for fall.

title: Raisin Scone
shortDescription: A soft and crumbly scone filled with juicy raisins.

title: Chocolate Chip
shortDescription: Classic cookies filled with chunks of chocolate chips.

title: Lemon Cake
shortDescription: A dense and moist cake with a zesty lemon flavor.

title: Banana Bread
shortDescription: A moist and sweet loaf made with ripe bananas.

title: Biscotti
shortDescription: Crispy, twice-baked Italian cookies with almond slices.

title: Raspberry Tart
shortDescription: A buttery tart crust filled with raspberry jam and topped with fresh raspberries.

title: Peach Cobbler
shortDescription: Sweet peaches baked under a golden, flaky biscuit topping.

title: Coconut Macaroons
shortDescription: Chewy coconut cookies with a crisp outer layer.

title: Cherry Danish
shortDescription: A flaky pastry filled with sweet cherry jam and cream cheese.

title: Pecan Pie
shortDescription: A rich, sweet pie filled with toasted pecans and a caramel-like filling.

title: Maple Muffin
shortDescription: A sweet muffin with maple syrup and crunchy pecans.

title: Cranberry Bread
shortDescription: A tangy bread made with cranberries and fresh orange zest.

title: Drizzle Cake
shortDescription: A light and fluffy cake soaked in lemon syrup and topped with icing.

title: Cheese Danish
shortDescription: A flaky pastry filled with sweet cream cheese and topped with a sugary glaze.
